metadata.name: Dreaming of hats
metadata.description:
Hats have always fascinated me and this particular shop in London, with its colourful fedoras, is a true dream for a street photographer! I was there with my camera and when I saw this man stopping, wearing his own fedora , probably to dream of some more hats, I immediately knew this was my "decisive moment" and this shot was born.  
"Dreaming of hats" was taken in London in 2022.
